attributes.action: being allowed to teach boundries in the caring industries of independent living clients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We agree with the the concept of independent living with those with learning and physical disabilities but as a proffesional carer and family member to someone who has learning difficulties i am concerned that we are no longer allowed to carefully teach boundries and limitations which could potentially put the clients families and public at risk

rejection.details: You will need to request a specific course of action from the Prime Minister in order to have your pettion accepted.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
